mapper.select: SELECT * FROM route WHERE ro_ai_start = #{aiNum} OR ro_ai_end = #{aiNum}

select *, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_start) as ai_name_start, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_end) as ai_name_end from route where ro_ai_start = #{ro_ai_start} and ro_ai_end = #{ro_ai_end}

select route.*, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_start) as ai_name_start, ai_name as ai_name_end from route join airport on ai_num = ro_ai_end where ro_ai_start = #{ai_num} and ro_state = true

select route.*, ai_name as ai_name_start, (select ai_name from airport where ai_num = ro_ai_end) as ai_name_end from route join airport on ai_num = ro_ai_start where ro_ai_end = #{ai_num} and ro_state = true
select ro_num from route where ro_ai_start = #{ro_ai_start} and ro_ai_end = #{ro_ai_end} and ro_state = true
mapper.update: update route set ro_state = false where ro_num = #{ro_num}
